scripts.generate: npm run uncss && npm run blog && COAL_WEB_SERVER=/coal bundle exec jekyll build --source src --destination public_html
scripts.blog: curl -s https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/phame/blog/feed/7/ -o src/_data/blog.xml && xml2json src/_data/blog.xml src/_data/blog.json && rm src/_data/blog.xml
scripts.jekyll: npm run generate && bundle exec jekyll serve --source src --destination public_html
scripts.preuncss: bundle exec jekyll build --source src --destination public_html
